Nice game, toxic community.
If you want to play as killer you need to prepare for a very long queue time. I like the idea behind the perks you "learn", sometimes disagree with the balancing on either side (Survivor/Killer) though. 
I love the game from a visual point of view, but it has some serious problems with bugs and server latency. In the end it's still fine for me as the developer team is a pretty small company and for the money you pay you'll get a lot of fun in return.
(Or you waste a lot of time you should rather invest in school like me)

My take: You should definitely play it with friends and you have to understand that the learning curve is pretty high, so don't worry if it's too difficult at the beginning. :)

Extremely fun. Surprisingly fast paced survival horror game. I am learning to be the killer and am having loads of fun EVEN if I lose! Matchmaking is funky, placing me with reds which are extremely high levels, but that also helps me to learn to play even faster for people like me who learn from their losses. 10/10 for me.

The most beautiful game I have ever played and seen. Recommend 10/10.

The game developers are so dumb, they literally took the best killer in the game and made his ever harder to play against. Bubba was already way over powered and then made him even MORE over powered. This ruins every game that I play against Bubba, like you can't even run him, no way to loop, no way to make him hit a wall with his weapon, and he can always use his chainsaw which is a one shot. This was a bad change, and then they took a killer that everyone could beat and made it even easier to beat him. What I am saying is if you are going to play killer why not make it easy and play Buuba. #WorstDecision Hopefully next update will actually be a good choice. To the developers team, do not make an impossible killer even more impossible, Or at least make it like Nurse where you have become amazing to play good with that OP killer. I only recommend this game because of it's unique game play, but watch out for the toxic community, watch out for the impossible killers, and watch out for the terrible match making system. And good luck to anyone playing against a Buuba from now on because that crap is broken.

This is the best asymmetrical multiplayer title I have ever played. With a bevy of recognizable characters, as well as wonderfully designed original ones, helps keep each match a unique experience. It is an extremely replayable game that has kept me interested far longer than I thought it would.

There are only a few gripes that I have with this game:
1) As I'm sure you've read in other reviews, the community in this game is by far the most toxic, cringe inducing, sweaty-neckbeards-stuck-in-their-mom's-basement group of degenerates I've ever witnessed in a video game. I highly recommend completely ignoring post game chat at all cost unless you've got thick skin.

2) The game is the first title that Behavior Interactive have developed, and with that status you will notice that this game is riddled with bugs. It has gotten much better with time as the devs have grown, and it is more than playable. However, sometimes glitches and bugs happen that will cause some frustration, but nothing too serious. 

Overall I would highly recommend this game to anyone, even if you don't have friends to queue with, because playing the solo role of killer is where the real challenge and fun lies.

See you in the Fog.

This is not a newcomer friendly game, and it really makes it unfun. I've put in 77 hours, and by skill standards I'm still pretty much a newcomer because of how large the skill gap is in this game. Since it is an asymmetric game, the balancing is tough for Behavior, and they don't do a good job of it in my opinion. There are so many perks that everyone pretty much uses, and if you haven't grinded for hours and hours or pay money, you won't have those perks putting you at a disadvantage causing the game to either be pay to win for you, or you have to deal with so many hours put into the game where you are at such a disadvantage where it just isn't fun in order to catch up to other players.

Do you have a full squad to play custom games? Get this game
Will you play solo or duo with a friend on online? Dont get this game

I've been constantly returning to the game every few months. Most of the time I stop playing because the matchmaking takes hours to find a match. Now, I finally returned to play with a friend and what do I find? 3 of 4 matches being against rank 1 killers. WHAT? Dude, I returned after 5-6 months to play this, I'm not even rank 15 and I get to play with rank 1 killers. It's frustrating. My friend is like lvl 4, he started playing today, and we have to deal with this nonsense? I'm sick of it. I think I'll be leaving the game again for a few months... what a disappointing game =/. DO NOT BUY THIS UNTIL THEY FIX THEIR BROKEN MATCHMAKING. YOU WILL NOT HAVE ANY FUN.

This game is overall very good. At first it is very hard for beginners that don't know what they are doing. But once you get the base skills down you get into the real fun of the game. The 1 v 1 moments between the killer and survivor are a ton of fun and you get to put all of your skill on display. The game is not very balanced but otherwise it is a ton of fun.

online only game that puts low ranked players against people who are or are close to top rank. there is no fun in the game when as the killer you are forced to either be ran around the map or pray that the survivors will let you kill them. as a survivor the killer either runs you down all game until you are taken out of it or you get lucky. FIX YOUR DAMN MATCHMAKING ALREADY. until they do, i can't recommend this game to anyone.

Dead By Daylight é um jogo assimétrico com 4 sobreviventes contra um assassino. basicamente os sobreviventes precisam completar 5 geradores pelo mapa pra poder escapar e a função do assassino é justamente impedir que isso aconteça não importando os meios.

O mesmo tem mecânicas completamente quebradas e injustas, sem contar que o mesmo possui uma comunidade extremamente toxica, chegando a nível de "CS GO e LOL", utilizando palavras de baixo calão, preconceito, xenofobia e até racismo. 

Em relação a gameplay, quem se dedica a jogar esse jogo de assassino tem que se acostumar com a "TOXIDADE" citados acima, já que todas as vezes eles vão chorar por ter perdido a partida sem importar a razão. xingamentos dentro do jogo e no seu perfil da steam sera comum.

O jogo é infestado de bugs e exploits que existem desde o lançamento do jogo e só vai piorando a cada atualização já que os desenvolvedores arrumam uma coisa e bugam outra que não tem nada a ver apenas mostrando que o código do jogo é uma completa bagunça.
